column1: fernaosilveira,Fernão,Silveira,"Vice President, Global Media Relations, Communications Strategy, Planning & Performance Monitoring at Stellantis",https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQHC8LtgyFc19Q/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1608135914673?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=CQkBXjFgOjxpKU_xvS5S-KVPkVD_FyIwBUC6_9Kkp6s,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E16AQHh-txrC1Eyaw/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1610905173557?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=NuNFgsk1D9yC4Uzv4fwJqIwGoz2hym5GxiEEa5dpGKM,personal,ACoAAAHxqS8B2n_rDf12IXYBHctZkXFL_VA2eJc,32614703,,"I am a passionate, hands-on and visionary communicator with almost 25 years of market experience and a track record of success in the most diverse and competitive environments – from a regional newspaper in Brazil to Fortune 50 global companies in the United States, Europe and in Latin America. Journalist by trade, all-round public affairs professional by experience, I’m committed to leading high-performance teams and building holistic strategies to help companies stand out from competition through impactful, engaging and vibrant communications.

• Key Stakeholder Engagement Strategies","{'country': 'Netherlands', 'short': 'Hoofddorp, North Holland', 'city': 'Hoofddorp', 'state': 'North Holland', 'default': 'Hoofddorp, North Holland, Netherlands'}",True,False,"[{'url': None, 'title': 'Fernão Silveira assume cargo global de comunicação na Stellantis', 'description': 'Depois de dois anos e meio como líder da área de comunicação corporativa e sustentabilidade da FCA para a América Latina, e desde o início do ano na recém-formada Stellantis, Silveira agora vai responder diretamente a Bertrand Blaise, vice-presidente executivo e responsável mundial pela área de comunicação da Stellantis.', 'image': None}, {'url': None, 'title': 'Fernão Silveira assume cargo global na Comunicação da Stellantis', 'description': 'Executivo brasileiro responderá diretamente ao vice-presidente mundial da área', 'image': None}, {'url': None, 'title': 'Estreia surpreendente - CE', 'description': 'A nova versão da picape, líder em seu segmento há duas décadas, surgiu no dia 26 de junho de 2020, sob um inédito modelo de aparição em que se destacaram a superação, a versatilidade e a resiliência da Comunicação Corporativa da companhia. Also, the only executive from the Automotive Industry to be ranked among the 10 finalists.', 'issuer': 'Comunique-se Group', 'date': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, {'title': ""Brazil's Corporate Communications Event of the Year - Nova Fiat Strada Launch"", 'description': 'FCA LATAM team recognized for the planning, execution and results of the innovative, 10% digital launch of Nova Fiat Strada at the peak of the pandemic period in Brazil. https://www.aberje.com.br/ce/107/premio-aberje-2020/estreia-surpreendente', 'issuer': 'ABERJE (Brazilian Association of Corporate Communications)', 'date': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, {'title': 'Communicator of the Year - 2020', 'description': 'Recognized for the second straight year as one of Brazil's ""Corporate Communicators of the Year"" for his accomplishments and contributions for the development of Communications in Brazil. https://www.aberje.com.br/ce/107/premio-aberje-2020/comunicador-do-ano-fernao-silveira/', 'issuer': 'ABERJE (Brazilian Association of Corporate Communications)', 'date': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, {'title': 'Comunicador do Ano 2019 - ABERJE', 'description': 'Também foram premiados os Comunicadores que tiveram mais destaque em 2019, por conta do trabalho desenvolvido dentro e fora de suas respectivas empresas. Como acontece em toda edição, os dez nomes foram abertos para votação popular e o escolhido pelo público foi Fernão Silveira, diretor de Comunicação Corporativa e Sustentabilidade para a América Latina da FCA – Fiat Chrysler Automóveis.

FIAT CHRYSLER AUTOMÓVEIS BRASIL (Projeto Rota do Saber em Pernambuco)', 'issuer': 'ABERJE - Associação Brasileira de Comunicação Empresarial', 'date': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, {'title': 'Prêmio Jatobá em Assessoria de Imprensa', 'description': 'Ford Brasil e Burson-Marsteller conquistaram o Prêmio Jatobá de Comunicação, categoria Assessoria de Imprensa, com o case ""Lançamento do Mustang no Brasil"".', 'issuer': 'Mega Brasil Comunicação', 'date': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, {'title': 'Prêmio Empresas que Melhor se Comunicam com Jornalistas ', 'description': 'Organized by CECOM (Communications Studies Centre) and ""Negócios da Comunicação ""magazine, the ""Empresas que Melhor se Comunicam com Jornalistas"" (Companies with the Best Relationship with Journalists) award is aimed at recognizing the professionalism and high-quality dialogue sustained by leading brands with the media in Brazil, ensuring a transparent and productive access to information.', 'issuer': 'CECOM / Negócios da Comunicação', 'date': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': 'Certificate of Excellence for B2B Communications - Latin American SABRE Awards', 'description': 'Recognition earned by Dow and agency Edelman with the case  ""Communicating the Invisible"" - B2B communications strategy built to promote the Company's contributions to enable the Rio 2016 Olympic Games.  ', 'issuer': 'The Holmes Report', 'date': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, {'title': 'Prêmio Eco Brasil 2016', 'description': 'Since 1982, ""Prêmio Eco"" is the pioneer award to highlight and recognize sustainability and corporate social responsibility projects implemented by leading companies in Brazil. Dow won ""Prêmio Eco"" in 2016 thanks to its innovative and comprehensive program developed to mitigate the direct carbon footprint associated with the organization and delivery of the Rio 2016 Olympic and Paralympic Games.', 'issuer': 'American Chamber of Commerce - São Paulo', 'date': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, {'title': 'Prêmio Brasil Ambiental', 'description': 'Created in 2005, AmCham Rio's ""Brasil Ambiental"" award recognizes and highlights corporate sustainability initiatives from companies nationwide. In 2016, Dow was recognized for the carbon mitigation program developed on behalf of the Rio 2016 Organizing Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games.', 'issuer': 'American Chamber of Commerce - Rio de Janeiro', 'date': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, {'title': 'Gold Award - Rio 2016 Olympic Games project', 'description': 'Gold Awards are given for work that has broad impact across, teams, plants, work groups or the Company as a whole, creating greater profitability, sustainability and growth. It is work that often takes months to complete, requiring focus, follow-through and a passion for delivering high-quality results. Gold Award recipients are seen consistently as role models. Their work is often substantially innovative, requires courageous leadership and risk taking, and leads to significant internal and external customer satisfaction.', 'issuer': 'The Dow Chemical Company', 'date': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, {'title': 'Silver Award', 'description': 'A Silver Award honors work that may be accomplished outside of the recipient’s normal scope of work. It acknowledges a higher level of effort, impact, or results; including exceeding expectations or goals, being proactive on a project, or contributing directly to the team, plant, work group, or site.  Silver Award recipients look for innovative ways to approach work, reach for challenging goals, balance risk with opportunity, and deliver high-quality results.  At times, Silver-level performance means overcoming significant obstacles or challenges.', 'issuer': 'The Dow Chemical Company', 'date': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, {'title': 'Finalist - 2015 SABRE Awards North America', 'description': ""The SABRE (Superior Achievement in Branding, Reputation & Engagement) Awards are the world's biggest PR awards programme, dedicated to benchmarking the best PR work from across the globe. Dow has made the short list in the Corporate Media Relations category for the communications strategy around the USA Luge sled re-design program, focusing on the Sochi 2014 Olympic Winter Games."", 'issuer': 'The Holmes Report', 'date': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, {'title': 'Diamond Keepsake Award - Sochi 2014 Olympic Winter Games project', 'description': ""The Diamond Keepsake Award is Dow's highest honor, recognizing contributions that outshine all the rest and generate tremendous, long-lasting impact on the Company's business results."", 'issuer': 'The Dow Chemical Company', 'date': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, {'title': 'Prêmio ABS de Jornalismo', 'description': 'Manager of the Communications team from Catho Online that produced the story on workplace safety awarded with ""Prêmio Agência Brasil de Segurança"" - 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHURyWugU5A4g/company-logo_400_400/0/1608225605867?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Rc9EMxvbGY7QyF8GSbCR-n5N-O-36xe7lCFeGpinrTU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/stellantis/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Stellantis', 'description': ""My role as Global Head of Media Relations and Crisis Management is to command the flow of communication between the Company and the media + key opinion-makers/influencers, building and fostering trust-based and productive relationships with key stakeholders across traditional and online media channels. I also work to establish and implement strategic communications plans; help develop and validate messaging for press releases and pitches, talking points, media statements, etc. Other responsibilities include positioning Company executives as subject matter experts; monitoring and tracking media coverage; organizing media briefings and press conferences; managing crisis communications; media coaching; and serving as official company spokesperson. As Head of Crisis Management, I'm charged with protecting corporate reputation from significant business and corporate crisis by building operational prevention and reaction plans. I'm responsible for providing strategic insights, initiative management, and program analytics to lead Crisis Management response, as well as working with senior levels of management and executive partners across all lines of business to develop innovative solutions to mitigate various types of reputational risks to the company."", 'title': 'Vice President, Global Media Relations, Communications Strategy, Planning & Performance Monitoring', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 69731863, 'name': 'Stellantis Latam', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHvpgZbwoubwA/company-logo_400_400/0/1610127954263?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=HdmX7Rf42k-88qH2vRmkXiIZRXG7AUGmJMCfAKjof_g', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/stellantislatam/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Betim, Minas Gerais, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Stellantis South America', 'description': 'Responsible for Corporate Communications, leading multi-faceted strategies aimed at strengthening the corporate reputation of Stellantis LATAM and its leading Brands.

Heading disciplines that work fully integrated and cross-functionally: Media Relations (focused on Corporate matters and Product media); Events (to engage key external and internal stakeholders); Public Relations (as the versatile discipline that brings all others together) and Sustainability (being responsible for managing 100+ community and environmental programs across LATAM that reinforce our license to operate and ensure an efficient management of our operational footprint).

I’m also the president of Casa Fiat de Cultura, an arts & culture institute maintained by Fiat in downtown Belo Horizonte (Minas Gerais) – one of the state’s most prestigious and prominent arts and culture centers. In my first year as president, Casa Fiat has received over 170,000 visitors. It also maintains a year-round prolific education program, hosting students from ages 10-17 from public (mainly) and private local schools for workshops, lectures and guided tours.', 'title': 'Corporate Communications & Sustainability Director LATAM | President, Casa Fiat de Cultura', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 25013918, 'name': 'FCA Latam (Fiat Chrysler Automobiles)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEe_fXh5_yWCA/company-logo_400_400/0/1608230328664?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=BB1B__T4h-EYvYA0hcvwnMDJdsiH-jCcpO6oYheTYeo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/fcalatam/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Betim, Minas Gerais, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'FCA Latam (Fiat Chrysler Automobiles)', 'description': 'At FCA LATAM, I lead a team of 30+ skilled communicators and sustainability experts located at 5 different sites across Latin America (from Venezuela to Argentina). 
  
My key challenge as LATAM Corporate Communications & Sustainability Director is to rebuild the Corporate Communications functions and lead a multi-faceted strategy aimed at strengthening the corporate reputation of FCA (as a company) and its leading Brands (mainly Fiat, Jeep, Mopar and RAM) before key stakeholders (media, government, communities, academia) in LATAM. 

My functional strategy at FCA is built upon four leading disciplines that work fully integrated and cross-functionally: Media Relations (focused on Corporate matters and Product media); Events (to engage key external and internal stakeholders in FCA’s and its Brands’ key messages); Public Relations (as the versatile discipline that brings all others together) and Sustainability (being responsible for managing 100+ community and environmental programs across LATAM that reinforce our license to operate and ensure an efficient management of our operational footprint).

I’m also the president of Casa Fiat de Cultura, an arts & culture institute maintained by Fiat in downtown Belo Horizonte (Minas Gerais) – one of the state’s most prestigious and prominent arts and culture centers. In my first year as president, Casa Fiat has received over 170,000 visitors. It also maintains a year-round prolific education program, hosting students from ages 10-17 from public (mainly) and private local schools for workshops, lectures and guided tours.', 'title': 'Corporate Communications & Sustainability Director - LATAM | President, Casa Fiat de Cultura', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1483, 'name': 'Ford Motor Company', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHZnQf3t8fKKg/company-logo_400_400/0/1620306010588?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=RJwcg7fiOrWivxCLUObLjRAcwXVsjiUy4ZN9EiN1YuQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ford-motor-company/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Ford Motor Company', 'description': 'Responsible for leading strategic plan development of communications priorities within the Ford South America business unit while ensuring full alignment of initiatives with global Communications leadership at the headquarters in Dearborn, MI. As the leader of a diverse, highly skilled team of communicators, Fernão was charged with developing and delivering inventive, aggressive and proactive programs designed to improve corporate reputation and increase purchase consideration for Ford’s products in the region - cars, pickup trucks, heavy trucks and off-road/4x4 vehicles (Troller) - keeping a close eye on market-specific needs and nuances.', 'title': 'Corporate Communications Director, South America', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2562, 'name': 'Dow Chemical', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQG7ZR8Ib4kqpg/company-logo_400_400/0/1688236511481?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wcX342pUp6CNApyDeOC13UqhG_luFBD_ZIiMTi-5szc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/dow-chemical/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Midland, Michigan (3/2012-11/2015) and São Paulo, SP (12/2015 - 12/2016)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Dow', 'description': ""Responsible for the overarching corporate and business communications strategies for the Olympic Games and other sports-related activations across regions, functions and business units at Dow - Worldwide Olympic Partner and the Official Chemistry Company of the Olympic Games. 
• Responsible for the development and implementation of the global communications strategy that generated over 2.1 billion media impressions for Dow around the world, highlighting the Company's role as a key enabler of the first Olympic Games in South America.
